post:
We are a little German Hosting company and offers some cheap vps this week.
Our support, website and webinterfaces arn't fully available in german, but we try our best to support non german customers equal to german customers.



**vServer OpenVZ SSD Special #1 for 1€/month(12€ for 12 month)**
> CPU: 1 vCore  
> RAM: 256 MB  
> SSD Swap: 512 MB     
> Storage: 5 GB   
> Connection: 1 GBit/s Shared   

**vServer OpenVZ SSD Special #2 for 3€/month(18€ for 6 month)**
> CPU: 1 vCore  
> RAM: 1 GB  
> SSD Swap: 2 GB  
> Storage: 20 GB  
> Connection: 1 GBit/s Shared  

**vServer OpenVZ SSD Special #3 for 5€/month(30€ for 6 month)**
> CPU: 2 vCore  
> RAM: 2 GB   
> SSD Swap: 3 GB  
> Storage: 40 GB  
> Connection: 1 GBit/s Shared  

**Host**  
CPU: Intel I7 3930K  
RAM: 64 GB DDR3  
Storage: 4 * 1 TB HW RAID 10  
SSD: 256 GB  
Connection: 1 GBit/s  

- Traffic: Fair use
- Virtualisierung: OpenVZ
- Webpanel: OpenVZ Webpanel.
- Location: Germany - Accellerated Frankfurt a.M.

Payment via Paypal.

Order: [Link](https://mc-gameserver.de/?page=server&kat=19)



I hope all important information are included.
